turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Google. How are you doing?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am doing good. How was your day?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm.. It was hectic and i am having a head ache

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's bad. Can i order some coffee for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh..That's awesome. Thank you so much. Coffee will definitely work wonders on headache.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: YEs sure

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order a coffee from Starbucks. I already have an account there

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Let me pull the menu for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you prefer Caffe Macchiato?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I would love to have it as its my favourite

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I knew that from your past orders and hence made a suggestion.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nice

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about milk and other additional addons

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order a double size cup with Zero fat milk and less sugar. Also some whipped cream on the top

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok Got it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also order some cookies, preferably the italian cookies, they were mouth watering when we ordered the previous time

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. I can do that for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ORder has been placed for Caffe Macchiato and it costed you 6.99$. Payment was done through your ewallet

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok..That great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order details will be texted to your mobile

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. Got it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else i can help you with

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No..Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks you. Have a good rest of your day
